CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The HOMO levels of the POBDTPD and PEBDTPD polymers were -5.23 and -5.37 eV , respectively.

Let's think step by step.

1. HOMO: Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital
2. POBDTPD: Poly(octylene bis(3,5-dithiophenedithio)phenylene)
3. PEBDTPD: Poly(ethylene bis(3,5-dithiophenedithio)phenylene)

So, the Material Name entities in the paragraph are POBDTPD and PEBDTPD.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. POBDTPD
2. PEBDTPD

These are the entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to Material Names.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The HOMO levels of the POBDTPD and PEBDTPD polymers were -5.23 and -5.37 eV , respectively.

Let's think step by step.

1. HOMO: Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital
2. POBDTPD: Poly(octylene bis(3,5-dithiophenedithio)phenylene)
3. PEBDTPD: Poly(ethylene bis(3,5-dithiophenedithio)phenylene)

So, the Property Names in the paragraph are: HOMO (Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital), POBDTPD (Poly(octylene bis(3,5-dithiophenedithio)phenylene)), and PEBDTPD (Poly(ethylene bis(3,5-dithiophenedithio)phenylene)).
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. HOMO (Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital)
2. POBDTPD (Poly(octylene bis(3,5-dithiophenedithio)phenylene))
3. PEBDTPD (Poly(ethylene bis(3,5-dithiophenedithio)phenylene))

These are the entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to Material Properties. The numbers (-5.23 eV and -5.37 eV) are values associated with the HOMO levels of the mentioned polymers.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| --- |

| PEBDTPD (Poly(ethylene bis(3,5-dithiophenedithio)phenylene)) |
